title: Hi Everyone,
description:
Hi Everyone,

Have you successfully cracked a Product-Based Company? Are you a Scholar of a company’s initiative or the proud recipient of a prestigious scholarship?

Why keep your story to yourself? 🤔

I’m launching a new series where 𝗬𝗢𝗨 can share your journey with the world today! 🎤 Let’s inspire and guide others by sharing the preparation strategies, interview experiences, and valuable lessons that helped you succeed.

From end-to-end preparation strategies, to interview processes, and the challenges you faced, we want to hear it all! 🌟

Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting your career, your story could be the blueprint someone else needs to reach their goals. Let’s motivate the next wave of talent and light the path for those looking to break into the industry.

👉 Want to participate?
Please fill out this Google form: https://forms.gle/SNYrTvpc3jmQCCno7
and connect with me here on LinkedIn. 

Let's inspire together! 💬

Stay tuned for the first story dropping soon! 🎉

I am looking forward to your stories! Let's make a difference, one story at a time.

title: Walmart is hiring Females passing out in 2024 and 2025 - CodeHers Hackathon
description:
Walmart is hiring Females passing out in 2024 and 2025 - CodeHers Hackathon

Package : INR 18-21 Lakhs + 2.35 Joining Bonus and stock grants upto 2.5 Lakhs

Eligibility : 2024 and 2025 female passouts. 

Job Location: Bangalore/Chennai

● Summer Internships Opportunities 2024 (May – June) for 2025 passouts
● Pre Placement Interview Opportunity for 2024 passouts 

Hiring Process:

- MCQ challenge (on topics like C, Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, Java, DBMS, Object-Oriented Programming, along with other Computer Science fundamentals in 25 minutes)
- Coding Challenge (2 Coding questions to be solved in 90 minutes)
- Cumulative scores of the above levels will show us the leaderboard of the top coders!

title: Hi Everyone, I am receiving some DMs that I am sharing diversity hiring Opportunities or opportunities for junior batches.
description:
Hi Everyone, I am receiving some DMs that I am sharing diversity hiring Opportunities or opportunities for junior batches. 

It's not like that. I am not with any gender or any batch,  I try my Best to help all the students. I am with all the students who are looking for opportunities ( irrespective of gender or Batch ). Whenever i recieve any opportunity that will help students, I share that in my community with all the relevant details.

It's the companies that are hiring,  I am not creating any gender or batch specific opportunity. I hope you all will understand that.

Baaki koi shikayat ho to aap log mujhe Linkedin pe message kr skte ho :)
Will try my Best to improve this community and help students.

Radhe Radhe 🙏

title: #Flipkart is Hiring
description:
#Flipkart is Hiring

We are looking for Lead - Hub Operations / Hub - Incharge for Odisha. 
 
Location - Jharsuguda 
 
Qualification - Min Grad or MBA 
 
Experience - Min 3 - 4 yrs 
 
Skills Required : 
 
1. Operational Knowledge of Logistics/ Couriers/Retail/FMCG industry. 
2. Ability to identify problems related to the hub, taking appropriate action for resolution. 
3. Skill and knowledge of operating ERP used in logistics/supply chain and related industry. 
4. Experience of leading and coaching Hub operations and support teams will be preferred. 
5. Has the ability to identify, analyze and propose solutions for effective and efficient Hub operations. 
6. Should have strong customer orientation and willingness to maintain a balanced approach when 
resolving customer complaints. Is the vital link between the customer and the management team. 
7. Has the ability to communicate in the most effective manner with juniors, peers, seniors, customers 
and vendors. 
8. Awareness of statutory compliances required for successfully operating a Hub in specific area / region. 
9. Should know computing skills especially reasonable knowledge and skills of Microsoft Office 
application such as MS Word, MS Excel, MS Power point and MS Outlook mail. 
10. Should be able to coordinate with vendors and 3rd Party partners. 
 
Interested Candidates can share their updated resume at - das.ankita@flipkart.com 
Subject - HI_Jharsuguda

title: Company Name : Trilogy Innovations
description:
Company Name : Trilogy Innovations

Summer Internship Internship profile: 
SDE Intern ( Pre final year students, passing out in 2024) : Open positions 50
Stipend : Rs 1,50,000 + Other benefits
Location : Remote
Tentative Start Date : 15th May 2023


Role we are hiring for and compensation : Job description attached for your reference and to share with all students.  

Job Description : https://lnkd.in/dse3xnbJ

Eligibility Criteria : All B.tech / M.tech / BSC / MSC / BCA / MCA graduates are allowed to apply for the position.

Note : Students from all streams such as Computer science, Information technology, electronics, electrical etc are all eligible. What will make the student successful in our process is mentioned in the attached Student docket for your reference and to share with all students.

Recruitment Process :
- 120 minutes technical test on an online platform. (18th Dec 2022, Sunday 12 PM - 2 PM )
- Shortlisted students from above take a 15 minute CCAT (Cognitive Criteria Aptitude Test) ( Will share mail with shortlists by 22nd Dec 2022)
- Further shortlisted students go through 1-4 rounds of virtual technical interviews
- Final step is a 15 minute PCCAT (Proctored Cognitive Criteria Aptitude Test)

Link to apply : https://lnkd.in/dUpDPsKs

title: Devlance is a leading IT service provider and it's growing its presence in the industry day by day by delivering its best to their clients in various domains like web, mobile applications, blockchain, UI/UX, etc. Our main aim is to provide best services to our clients.
description:
Devlance is a leading IT service provider and it's growing its presence in the industry day by day by delivering its best to their clients in various domains like web, mobile applications, blockchain, UI/UX, etc. Our main aim is to provide best services to our clients.

you can find about us at devlance.in
and if you any more doubt or query regarding anything or want to ask anything more then kindly mail us at careers@devlance.in

We at Devlance hiring  
1. AWS Developer those are able to work on AWS Amplify, cloud functions, AWS too.

2. Blockchain Developer having knowledge of NFT marketplace like how they work, solidity, web3Js, cloud functions, both ethereum and polygon blockchain, reactJs, AWS Amplify is must.

3. LAMP Stack Developers having knowledge of php, laravel developers and having some projects in their resume or github, able to create api using laravel and whole backend and frontend.

4. Flutter Developers having knowledge of native android, flutter, and ads platforms like unity, fb and admob too.

5. MERN stack developer having good knowledge of makin responsive ui in reactjs using material ui or any other friendly library, also able to make custom backend using nodejs and expressjs and database using anyone of SQL or NoSQL will work.

6. Full stack Flutter Developers having knowledge of UI development in flutter, api integration and know backend stuff also like Nodejs, Expressjs.

If you are capable and having enough skills, and having some good projects in their resume or github.
then kindly send your resume and github at careers@devlance.in

or fill this google form

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeOAbLzeDlfJueEVIvxH8_OPJzW2EV3_1zConyTlt5eaAdcUA/viewform?usp=sf_link

Location- remote

Payout- 10-15K INR per month.

Duration - 2 months (as of now but may be extended too according to your availability and work you provided)

Flexible work hours, 6 days a week, Only Indians allowed.

title: GeeksforGeeks is coming up with an intensive program that can get you a full-time job opportunity!
description:
GeeksforGeeks is coming up with an intensive program that can get you a full-time job opportunity!

The GFG Elite Batch is a program where the candidates will be taught various tech and non-tech skills required for the tech job roles, will get an opportunity to gain hands-on experience with an internship offer and get placed too at GeeksforGeeks. The interesting part is that the candidate will get a stipend from the First day itself. 

There are three phases to this program. 

6 months intensive training under industry experts to gain tech and non-tech skills - A monthly fixed stipend will be paid. 

6 months internship period after an interview - A monthly fixed stipend will be paid. 

After your 6 months intensive training and 6 months internship period, your profile will be evaluated based on your performance throughout the internship period and you can stand a chance to get a full time placement opportunity at GeeksforGeeks. 

 

How to enroll for Elite Batch? 
There is an entrance examination (FREE OF COST) on 11th September, 2021, test link is mentioned in the description box.  

https://practice.geeksforgeeks.org/contest/geeksforgeeks-elite-batch-entrance-test/

 

To know more, find the details about Elite Batch Program on this link: 

https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/geeksforgeeks-elite-batch-learning-monthly-stipend-placement-no-fee-ever/
